title: Igor Yermakov
text:
Igor Vasilyevich Yermakov (; born 14 June 1977) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach and a former player. He is an assistant coach with <a href="FC%20Salyut%20Belgorod">FC Salyut Belgorod</a>.
Club career.
He played 8 seasons in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for 5 different clubs.
